title: Print, "Beached Fishing Boat", 1864
medium:
Lithograph on paper
Support: white wove paper laid down on thick wove paper
signed: Signed and dated (on stone ? in graphite over inscription on stone ?), lower left: T Moran 1864.
inscribed: Inscribed (by later hand) in graphite, lower left on mount: TMoran. l864 Lithograph; inscribed in graphite, upper right corner on mount: (1)
description: Horizontal view of a cloudy sky and a beached boat with nets and baskets being removed at right of center; with three men and a horse in left foreground; and chalk cliff and breakwater with beached boats in right background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Beached Fishing Boat", 1864.
1864. Lithograph on paper
Support: white wove paper laid down on thick wove paper. Gift of Thomas Moran. 1917-17-1.
